short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ExpressAI - personalized recruiting messages for LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize your recruitment with ExpressAI - our AI-driven platform generates tailored messages, ensuring you stand out in the LinkedIn inbox of high-quality candidates and potential clients. 

On any LinkedIn profile page, open ExpressAI and generate a cold outreach message to a potential candidate. The extension uses state of the art AI to generate a personalized message explaining why the candidate is a fit for the job description you choose.

Personalized messages stand out to candidates and have higher engagement and response rates that template cold outreach messages.

Before ExpressAI, recruiters needed to manually pick out skills and experience from the candidate's profile - ExpressAI saves you time while improving your response rates helping you hire candidates faster.

https://expressai.net
